sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelqu'un te cherchait tout à l'heure.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Someone was looking for you just now.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons nous promener dans le parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go for a walk in the park.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce bouquet de fleurs est vraiment beau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This bouquet of flowers is really beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En automne, les feuilles deviennent jaunes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In autumn, the leaves turn yellow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng huàn yī gè fángjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais changer de chambre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I would like to change rooms.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez présenter votre passeport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please show your passport.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette rivière est très longue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This river is very long.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè nándé de jīhuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une occasion rare.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a rare opportunity.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je te souhaite une bonne santé !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Wish you good health!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais te chercher à l'aéroport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'll pick you up at the airport.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 春节是中国最重要的节日。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chūnjié shì Zhōngguó zuì zhòngyào de jiérì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le Nouvel An chinois est la fête la plus importante en Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Spring Festival is the most important holiday in China.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Míngtiān jiāng jǔxíng yī chǎng huìyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Une réunion aura lieu demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A meeting will be held tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我经常去那家餐厅吃饭。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jīngcháng qù nà jiā cāntīng chīfàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais souvent manger dans ce restaurant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I often go to that restaurant to eat.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhī xiǎo gǒu zhēn kě'ài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce petit chien est vraiment mignon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This little dog is really cute.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a déjà quitté l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has already left the company.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Merci pour ton cadeau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Thank you for your gift.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ duì zhège jiéguǒ hěn mǎnyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis très satisfait de ce résultat.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am very satisfied with this result.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì sān niánjí de xuésheng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est en troisième année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a third-grade student.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 听到这个消息我很难过。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi wǒ hěn nánguò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai été très triste d'apprendre cette nouvelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I was very sad to hear this news.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Y a-t-il d'autres questions ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Are there any other questions?
